articles.title: PH stays 'very low risk' with negative growth rate, low ADAR - pna.gov.ph
articles.description: MANILA – The Philippines remained at “very low risk” classification for Covid-19 while countries in East Asia are experiencing a surge in new cases, the OCTA Research Group said Sunday.In a tweet, OCTA Research Group Fellow Dr. Guido David said the country’s …
articles.content:
MANILA – The Philippines remained at “very low risk” classification for Covid-19 while countries in East Asia are experiencing a surge in new cases, the OCTA Research Group said Sunday.

articles.title: Leon Jay Williams' 7-year-old daughter called ugly. He bites back - AsiaOne
